detailedSolution:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>m</mi>
  <mi>∡<!-- ∡ --></mi>
  <mi>x</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mn>66</mn>
      <mo>∘<!-- ∘ --></mo>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">m\measuredangle x = {66^ \circ }</annotation></semantics></math>, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>m</mi>
  <mi>∡<!-- ∡ --></mi>
  <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
  <mi>x</mi>
  <mo>+</mo>
  <mn>1</mn>
  <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mn>67</mn>
      <mo>∘<!-- ∘ --></mo>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">m\measuredangle (x + 1) = {67^ \circ }</annotation></semantics></math>, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>m</mi>
  <mi>∡<!-- ∡ --></mi>
  <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
  <mi>x</mi>
  <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
  <mn>19</mn>
  <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mn>47</mn>
      <mo>∘<!-- ∘ --></mo>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">m\measuredangle (x - 19) = {47^ \circ }</annotation></semantics></math>
